category.name: DecisionApps.RelationBrowser
category.category_description: Preferences for Decision Apps Relation Browser.

preference.name: RV1_DARB_Hide_Unhide_List_Order_Incoming_First
preference.preference_description: Specifies whether the Relations menu will display the nodes with the Incoming relations first or the Outgoing relations first. If the node has both incoming and outgoing relations, those nodes will be displayed between the incoming and outgoing nodes regardless of which set of nodes is displayed first. Value of true indicates incoming nodes will be displayed first, else the outgoing nodes will be first in the displayed list with the nodes designated as both will always be the second set of nodes. The default value is false.
